protein.specific_function: Hydrolyzes ADP-ribose (ADPR) to AMP and ribose 5'-phosphate.

reference.reference_text: Perraud AL, Fleig A, Dunn CA, Bagley LA, Launay P, Schmitz C, Stokes AJ, Zhu Q, Bessman MJ, Penner R, Kinet JP, Scharenberg AM: ADP-ribose gating of the calcium-permeable LTRPC2 channel revealed by Nudix motif homology. Nature. 2001 May 31;411(6837):595-9.
